meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>pipe</kanji> <kanji>control</kanji> <kanji>tower</kanji> is the tower that controls all the pipes... think of the pipes not as pipes, but as directions things are moving in. You're controlling all of that on a map, and the pipe shows where everything is going and you're changing it to be where it needs to go. You are in the <vocabulary>control tower</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
